recipe_name: White chocolate and orange soup with toasted marshmallows
author: James Tanner
method: Heat the double cream with the orange zest and lime zest in a saucepan over a low-medium heat. Pour the cream mixture over the melted white chocolate in a bowl and stir. Place the cherries, segmented oranges and marshmallows into a serving bowl and pour over the white chocolate mixture.  Use a mini blowtorch to brown the top of the mixture and garnish with mint leaves. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 300ml/½ pint double cream,  1 orange, zested and segmented,  1 lime, zest only,  100g/3½oz white chocolate, melted,  55g/2oz fresh cherries, stems and stones removed,  small handful mini marshmallows,  fresh mint leaves, to garnish
